title: Essentials of Economics 3rd edition Krugman c2014 textbook
description:
Essentials of Economics, 3rd edition (c2014), a textbook by Paul Krugman, Robin Wells and Kathryn Graddy.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.worthpublishers.com/Catalog/product/essentialsofeconomics-thirdedition-krugman" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.worthpublishers.com/Catalog/product/essentialsofeconomics-thirdedition-krugman</a>

Table of Contents:
 PART 1 What is Economics?
  01. First Principles
  02. Economic Models: Trade-offs and Trade
  Appendix: Graphs in Economics
 PART 2 Supply and Demand
  03. Supply and Demand
  04. Price Controls and Quotas: Meddling with Markets
  05. Elasticity and Taxation
 PART 3 The Production Decision
  06. Behind the Supply Curve: Inputs and Costs
  07. Perfect Competition and the Supply Curve
 PART 4 Beyond Perfect Competition
  08. Monopoly, Oligopoly, and Monopolistic Competition
  09. Externalities and Public Goods
 PART 5 Introduction to Macroeconomics
  10. Macroeconomics: The Big Picture
  11. GP and the CPI: Tracking the Macroeconomy
  12. Unemployment and Inflation
 PART 6 Economic Growth and Fluctuations
  13. Long-Run Economic Growth
  14. Aggregate Demand and Aggregate Supply
 PART 7 Stabilization Policy
  15. Fiscal Policy
  16. Money, Banking, and the Federal Reserve System
  17. Monetary Policy
  18. Crises and Consequences
 PART 8 The International Economy
  19. International Trade, Capital Flows, and Exchange Rates 


FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
compressed (zipped): right-click the filename (.7z) & choose Extract to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done seeding.
